lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I like helping individuals directly.  These small amounts of money make a big difference in countries far away.  Kiva brings them close.

lenders.name: Dylan
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate and when I checked out the website I thought it was really cool.  I wanted to help someone who was very close to meeting their goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 7th grader in Littleton, CO.  I play basketball and baseball

lenders.name: Crezette, Australia
lenders.occupation: Trainer of assistant dogs for the disabled
lenders.loan_because: I am on an Australian Disability Pension and this would be a fortune to Kiva borrowers. So, I wanted; with my Gift Voucher, to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Disabled people need to have the freedom to lead a fulfilling and independant  life as possible. An assistance dog gives them a choice . I also train homo sapiens for pet dogs. No fees are charged hence the Gift Voucher.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: Everyone on this planet should be given a chance to have success.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I've traveled and realize that although I live in the U.S., I'm still a citizen of the world.  Helping people get started in a business may inspire them to help others someday too.  Hopefully, lighting one little fire will keep it going around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help prepare our community for disasters including earthquakes, tsunamis, winter storms, wildland fires.  It's another case of helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: nancy
lenders.occupation: mother, grandmother, part of the world\

lenders.name: Denise Wakeman
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to own my own successful service business. I want to share the fruits of my success and help other entrepreneurs be successful as well.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am Founder of The Blog Squad and an Online Marketing Advisor.
I have been using the Internet with great success as a marketing tool since 1996 and am an expert at helping authors, speakers, service professionals, and small business owners leverage blogs for their business, as well as strategically use social media tools to boost online visibility to get more traffic, leads, clients and opportunities. 
 
I write regularly on 3 marketing blogs, am a contributing author on SocialMediaExaminer.com, have co-authored several blogging programs and frequently speak at conferences and workshops about business blogging and how to gain expert status through social marketing. I have been quoted in the Wall Street Journal, The Huffington Post, Newsday, Canada’s National Post, FastCompany Online, as well as many other on and offline publications.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate the me.

lenders.name: Ed

lenders.occupational_info: I teach research methods and statistics. I also consult in those areas

lenders.name: Mattea and Piers

lenders.name: ACU SIFE Team
lenders.occupational_info: SIFE (Students In Free Enterprise) is a global non-profit organization active in more than 40 countries. SIFE is funded by financial contributions from corporations, entrepreneurs, foundations, government agencies and individuals. Working in partnership with business and higher education, SIFE establishes student teams on university campuses. These teams are challenged to develop community outreach projects that reach SIFE's five educational topics: market economics, success skills, entrepreneurship, financial literacy, and business ethics.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: i recently went to uganda and tanzania. it changed my life.
lenders.occupational_info: i work with an organization that helps people in poverty in our city.

lenders.name: Randy & Meg
lenders.loan_because: We care!
lenders.occupational_info: Meg teaches 5th grade and I do carpentry work and other repairs to homes.

lenders.name: Jeremy Williams
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to live in a wealthy country. Those not so fortunate deserve whatever I give/loan them.
lenders.occupational_info:
Very difficult to describe. 
Basically I listen to peoples mental health problems and refer them to services

lenders.name: Shari
lenders.loan_because: Sharing my blessings is a value my parents instilled in me from childhood.  It is wonderful to be connected with others in this world as they take care of their families and enrich their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My work currently is being involved with my family and my community...both locally and internationally

lenders.name: Sky and Eric
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we know that we have more than most people in the world, and because we want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to children for whom it is not their first language, and Eric builds beautiful stone walls, fireplaces, terraces, and patios with the rocks that come from the land where we live.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in memory of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student in 8th grade.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Seems to be safer than the stock market right now

lenders.name: kirk
lenders.loan_because:
Neither a borrower nor a lender be; 
For loan oft loses both itself and friend, 
And borrowing dulls the edge of husbandry,
But if you have to choose:
hey, lending was never this easy.

lenders.name: Pepita
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women. I want to set an example to others. I want to see some of my money going to a good cause.

lenders.name: Darryl
lenders.loan_because: It's good for me.
lenders.occupational_info: Investor

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.occupational_info: I help structure organizations so they can be more effective.  I work directly with people to help them understand how to lead others and to gain experiences that will help them succeed.

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because:
Every little effort helps!  And also, I always believe that if only more people know how to share their love and blessings, the world will be a much better place!

That and plus the fact that Kiva makes it easy for us to lend! :-)

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.occupation: Photographer, Marketing Rep. & CEO of family
lenders.loan_because: I make a difference in many people's lives locally and would like to share my blessings globally.
lenders.occupational_info: I have two jobs. Monday through Friday, I work at a large global company's service center in Indiana. I talk on the phone and help people all over the United States.  And on Saturdays I take photos for weddings and family portraits.  I also volunteer at a local elementary school and I am a youth advisor at my spiritual center.

lenders.name: Imtiaz
lenders.loan_because: You a give a fish, you feed someone one meal.Train someone to fish, you will feed him for life.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: God has given me a good life, and I want to be an instrument He can use to improve the quality of life for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell the full range of Avon products, operate a web store, recruit new Avon representatives throughout the US, and raise funds for organizations.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: The world is my family.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick people.

lenders.name: Damien
lenders.loan_because: We are all just trying to survive.  We are each personally responsible to help one another due just that.

lenders.name: jfouts
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to make a huge difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people communicate through social media

lenders.name: Francisco
lenders.loan_because:
It's not a loan is an investment.
------------------------------------
No es un préstamo es una inversión
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in an NGO called Accion Emprendedora, this NGO help micro entrepreneurs to develop their business, in order to open new jobs places, reducing the unemployment. We are now working in Chile, Perú and Guatemala.
-------------------------
Trabajo en una ONG llamada Acción Emprendedora, en esta ONG nos dedicamos a asesorar a pequeños empresarios a que mejoren su negocio, con el objeto de que puedan contratar mas personas disminuyendo el desempleo.
Ahora estamos trabajando en Chile, Perú y Guatemala.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: we are all brothers and sisters, working together we have a positive effect for all.

lenders.name: Smilie
lenders.loan_because:
To, hopefully, improve chances for a next generation individual.
Who knows how great this individual might be as a result of a small loan.
Another entrepreneur will have hope for their and their family's immediate and possible long time future.

lenders.name: Shirley & Bill
lenders.loan_because: We feel richly blessed and want to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: We work for local and provincial governments in British Columbia.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It's a terrific way to make a positive, direct and immediate difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: The organization I work for promotes organic agriculture.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: Someone needs what I have, and it's easy for me to give.  I like knowing it's going to be used to help a specific person with a specific goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Human Resources for a high tech company in Silicon Valley

lenders.name: Bridget
lenders.loan_because: I would want someone to do the same for me.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to share in the blessings that God has given me
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student studying to become an Aerospace Engineer

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe those who are motivated to better their situations and their communities should be given the opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to promote different environmental campaigns such as the reduction of waste or the prevention of ocean pollution.

lenders.name: kerri
lenders.loan_because: I feel a duty to give back to the world that supports myself and my daughter.  I especially like to assist other single mothers who may have a more difficult life as a single mother than I have had here in the US.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students who are pursuing degrees in psychology in order to help people who have experienced trauma or who have mental illness.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I already do a lot of volunteering and contributing locally, but I think it's great to broaden our horizons and learn more about what the rest of the world is really like.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes that make them happy *and* help people to achieve their financial goals -- all while being kind to the environment!

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: I believe people are capable of improving their lives if given the chance.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I know the power of having someone believe in you enough to help make your dream and vision come true.  I want to put my money where my mouth is.

lenders.name: Rex Turgano
lenders.loan_because: I have seen first hand how small loans can make a difference. Rather than a hand out, people feel more accountable, empowered, and their self-esteem grows when they can pay the loan back themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to fix things but I also appreciate flaws.

lenders.name: Ralf-IFAPP
lenders.loan_because: What could be better than supporting friends all over the world fulfilling their dreams?

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse, specializing in burns and plastic surgery.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I'm not a wealthy person, but I get a great feeling by being able to help the Kiva entrepreneurs a little bit at a time.  It's nice lending money to people in need and watching their progress and then helping someone else!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an Italian restaurant.  I am responsible for creating menus, hiring and training staff, scheduling employees, ordering food, wine and other supplies.  My job is to keep the customers happy and coming back for more great food and fun times!

lenders.name: Carly
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I feel as though small entrepreneurial businesses will help the world grow and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a recent college graduate who is looking to begin a rewarding job much like entrepreneurs on this site. Good luck!

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.loan_because: God has been faithful to me and I want to share his blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a church office.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: On T.
lenders.loan_because: helping other people is a good use of my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze data

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I hope that I can help and allow some people to pursue their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computers and their software more effectively for their work.

lenders.name: WS - Singapore
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs help sometime.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: As a business owner I understand the hard work it takes to operate a business.  So anything I can do to help those who are working hard to earn a living makes me feel better about myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Own a small printing business and work in an elementary school as a custodian.

lenders.name: Natalia
lenders.loan_because: Its a simple way to contribute to something great!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a place that helps put pictures on a screen for people to watch. Television industry.

lenders.name: Kristian & Julie
lenders.loan_because: We hope that in some small way we can help others realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both registered nurses working in healthcare.  Julie works in the area of urology and I now work with computer software used by clinicians to treat patients.

lenders.name: J T
lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other in this world, person to person.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: What you put out there comes back ten fold
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor that helps people with back pain and other body problems

lenders.name: Prateek
lenders.loan_because: it's a great idea that should really catch on!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a medical student.

lenders.name: Delores
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good, that the money that can have so little meaning to me, can be of value and help someone else to meet their goals and feel productive and successful.
lenders.occupational_info: Gave support to Hospital computer systems.

lenders.name: Steven & Michelle
lenders.loan_because: To help those less fortunate than ourselves.  Every dollar can make such a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Steven is an Aircraft Maintenance Engineer and I am studying to be a Veterinary Assistant

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: i work with the research and devlopment of new pharmaceuticals.

lenders.name: Einar
lenders.loan_because: Want to see how this works.

lenders.name: Paulo
lenders.loan_because: I can. And because there are others who really need it to be able to explore their full potential
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers. I design and program software dedicated mostly to network management (power networks, water networks, railway systems, etc)

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: It beats a savings account.

lenders.name: Nicolas K
lenders.loan_because:
I have the money and they need it.
They have hopes and dreams. They want to build up their own better world. I want to contribute to it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an automotive international supplier. I'm coordinating the supply of plastic parts for all our production sites across the world. I'm based in Paris.
